page.title: 15POP MUSIC IN 1985
page.content: Popular, or 'pop' music today is sung mainly by groups.Almost all pop groups mime on their videos, which are usually very good and sell the records. In 1985 one of the most popular groups is 'Duran Duran'. Their latest video is situated on the Eiffel Tower in France.There are very few female 'pop' singers but one of the most well-known is Madonna, who is an American. I listen to Radio 1 every Sunday which tells the Top 40. 'Top of the Pops'is a television programme, also shows the top 40. Many of the groups have four or five members and they often break up and the lead singer then makes songs himself (or herself). A lot of bands make some songs and then you never hear of them again. My favourite singer at the moment is Madonna.
